page.title: 04EDUCATION ST NEOT SCHOOL
page.content: St Neot school is an old building .It was built in 1870. In the summer of 1985 there was 76 children in the school. There were three full time teachers and one part time teacher. There are two ancillaries. As there are no canteen facilities in the school the children walk to the village institute for dinner. The meals are cooked there by Mrs M Bellringer. Very few children in the school do not have school dinners. In the school we have a BBC computer, a photocopier, a colour television, a bigtrak, (a programmable toy) and two sets of technical lego.
